DOC.brief_summary: Two year old male with a new diagnosis of Inflammatory Myofibroblastic Tumour. The patient presented with 2 months of intermittent fever and 1-2 weeks of abdominal distention and constipation. An abdominal mass was palpable on exam and US concerning was for neoplasm of abdomen. Treatment with Crizotinib will be utilized to reduce the size of the lesion and create more optimal tissue plains between vital structures prior to attempted surgical resection would greatly reduce potential morbidity for this patient.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment With Crizotinib Single Patient Expanded Access IND 134375
DOC.criteria: This treatment plan is intended for the use of Crizotinib in the treatment of a single patient with Inflammatory Myofibroblastic Tumour Not applicable as Expanded Access only includes one patient
